title: AAI Recruitment 2026 - Apply Offline for Medical Consultant Posts
description: The Airports Authority of India (AAI) has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for Medical Consultant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the AAI Recruitment 2026 . Interested candidates can apply before the last date of application. If you are looking for more, here is ...
